RelatedSentence: Somalia could experience massive humanitarian crises against a backdrop of dwindling funds to support life - saving interventions , a senior UN relief official for Somalia said on Monday .
Somalia could experience massive humanitarian crises against a backdrop of dwindling funds to support life - saving interventions , a senior UN relief official for Somalia said on Monday .

Humanitarian coordinator for Somalia , Philippe Lazzarini , told a news conference in Nairobi that Somalia risked drifting into a humanitarian crisis due to fragile food situation , a spike in diseases and insecurity .
